ygData.subject: Questions about lvl 18 song
ygData.msgSnippet: I just reach lvl 18 yesterday and I was wondering if all experience bards can help me out on the used of the lvl 18 spell.  I know that it does dmg and lower
ygData.messageBody:
I just reach lvl 18 yesterday and I was wondering if all experience bards
can help me out on the used of the lvl 18 spell. I know that it does dmg
and lower ac. I was wondering, if the MOB get hit by this song then I stop
playing does their ac still down and still do dmg to them for another 2
melee or does it stop when u stop. Any info on this would be appreciated.

Thanx,
Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Samiam
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
